topic.title: Download on Linux using wget
topic.shortdesc: On a Linux system, you can download Couchbase Server directly by using the wget command.

To find the URL to specify in the wget command, use your browser's tools such as Inspector for Chrome.

The following steps explain how to use Chrome's Inspector:
On the Coucbase Server's download page, select the Download button next to the Linux version you want to download, such as SuSE Linux 11.
In the drop-down list select Inspect Element. The browser's Inspector screen opens on the right.
The highlighted area displays the download URL.
